description.zh-cn: 中国图书馆管理专家，原籍江苏徐州。
description.en: Chinese library management expert, with ancestral roots in Xuzhou, Jiangsu.

description.zh-cn: 山东省历史上的一个县，现为滕州市。
description.en: A former county in Shandong Province, now Tengzhou City.

nodes.id: 山东省文学艺术界联合会

zh-cn: 山东省文学艺术界联合会
en: Shandong Provincial Federation of Literary and Art Circles

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党山东省委员会领导下的专业性人民团体。
description.en: A professional people's organization under the leadership of the Shandong Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国国家图书馆的前身。
description.en: The predecessor of the National Library of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 丁志刚于1919年5月12日出生于山东滕县。
description.en: Ding Zhigang was born in Teng County, Shandong on May 12, 1919.

relationships.target: 山东省文学艺术界联合会

description.zh-cn: 丁志刚曾担任山东省文学艺术界联合会副主席。
description.en: Ding Zhigang once served as the Vice Chairman of the Shandong Provincial Federation of Literary and Art Circles.

description.zh-cn: 丁志刚曾担任北京图书馆党委副书记、副馆长。
description.en: Ding Zhigang once served as the Deputy Party Secretary and Deputy Director of the Beijing Library.

description.zh-cn: 根据页面分类“中国共产党党员”，丁志刚是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to the page category 'Communist Party of China members', Ding Zhigang was a member of the Communist Party of China.
